actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To continue the employee payroll tax cut through 2012.
short_title: Temporary Payroll Tax Cut Continuation Act of 2012

summary.text: Temporary Payroll Tax Cut Continuation Act of 2012 - Amends the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010 to extend through 2012 the 2% reduction in employment tax rates for employees and self-employed individuals.

titles.title: Temporary Payroll Tax Cut Continuation Act of 2012
To continue the employee payroll tax cut through 2012.
